participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and friendly, Emily enjoys deep conversations and sharing her interests with others.
participant_1.background: I enjoy reading. I love country. I'm going back to school. I'm a vegan.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and sociable, Jake loves music and connecting with people over shared interests.
participant_2.background: My brother is in a metal band and travels the world. I am in college now and want to be a teacher. I will be graduating in September and hope to get a teaching job soon. My family migrated to America when I was five.

content.text: Nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and listen to music.
I like to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but I especially like historical fiction and mystery novels.
I'm a big fan of historical fiction too. Do you have any favorite authors?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also really enjoy the works of Ken Follett.
I've heard good things about Outlander. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great series.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I mostly listen to country and rock.
I love country music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I love George Strait, Alan Jackson, and Shania Twain.
Those are all great artists! I'm a big fan of Reba McEntire and Luke Bryan.
Reba McEntire is amazing! I love her music.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
